title: Argumentative Essay Assignment
description: 5-page argumentative essay on a topic of your choice

criteria.title: Thesis Statement
criteria.description: Clear, arguable thesis that establishes the purpose of the essay

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Thesis is clear, specific, and arguable; effectively establishes the purpose

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Thesis is clear and arguable but could be more specific

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Thesis is present but lacks clarity or is too broad

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Thesis is vague or difficult to identify

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: No discernible thesis statement

criteria.title: Organization & Structure
criteria.description: Logical organization with clear introduction, body, and conclusion

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Flawless organization with compelling intro/conclusion and logical flow

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Well-organized with clear intro/conclusion and good transitions

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Generally organized but with some structural weaknesses

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Disorganized in several areas, affecting readability

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Lacks logical organization throughout

criteria.title: Evidence & Support
criteria.description: Use of credible sources and evidence to support arguments

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Comprehensive, relevant evidence from credible sources throughout

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Strong evidence from credible sources with minor gaps

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Adequate evidence but needs more depth or credibility

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Limited or questionable evidence with significant gaps

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Little to no credible evidence to support arguments

criteria.title: Analysis & Critical Thinking
criteria.description: Depth of analysis and critical engagement with the topic

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Sophisticated analysis showing exceptional critical thinking

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Strong analysis with good critical engagement

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Basic analysis with some critical thinking

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Limited analysis with minimal critical thinking

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Superficial treatment with no meaningful analysis

criteria.title: Grammar & Mechanics
criteria.description: Correct grammar, punctuation, spelling, and formatting

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Error-free writing with polished mechanics

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Few minor errors that don't interfere with meaning

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Several errors but meaning remains clear

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Numerous errors that sometimes obscure meaning

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Pervasive errors that significantly impede understanding

criteria.title: Style & Voice
criteria.description: Appropriate academic tone and effective writing style

levels.title: Excellent
levels.description: Sophisticated academic voice with engaging, effective style

levels.title: Good
levels.description: Consistent academic voice with strong style

levels.title: Satisfactory
levels.description: Generally appropriate tone with satisfactory style

levels.title: Needs Improvement
levels.description: Inconsistent tone or underdeveloped style

levels.title: Unsatisfactory
levels.description: Inappropriate tone with ineffective style
